name: Edwin C. NEVILLE, M.D., and James J. Osborne, Appellants, v. The PENNSYLVANIA PROPERTY AND CASUALTY INSURANCE GUARANTY ASSOCIATION, The Medical Professional Liability Catastrophe Loss Fund, now by merger, The Medical Care Availability and Reduction of Error Fund, Appellees
name_abbreviation: Neville v. Pennsylvania Property & Casualty Insurance Guaranty Ass'n

parties: Edwin C. NEVILLE, M.D., and James J. Osborne, Appellants, v. The PENNSYLVANIA PROPERTY AND CASUALTY INSURANCE GUARANTY ASSOCIATION, The Medical Professional Liability Catastrophe Loss Fund, now by merger, The Medical Care Availability and Reduction of Error Fund, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 18th day of July, 2006, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
901 A.2d 495
Edwin C. NEVILLE, M.D., and James J. Osborne, Appellants, v. The PENNSYLVANIA PROPERTY AND CASUALTY INSURANCE GUARANTY ASSOCIATION, The Medical Professional Liability Catastrophe Loss Fund, now by merger, The Medical Care Availability and Reduction of Error Fund, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 18, 2006.
